Description: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency entered into a settlement with Woodforest National Bank, The Woodlands, Texas, requiring the bank to pay approximately $32 million in reimbursement to consumers who were harmed by the bank's overdraft program. The settlement also required the bank to pay a Civil Money Penalty of $1 million to the U.S. Treasury.
Agency: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency
